title: Micheál Martin - Wikipedia
snippet: Martin was awarded "Politician of the Year" by the Journal for his performance and election result. He was elected again as Taoiseach in a 95–76 vote by the Dáil on 23 January 2025 following a coalition agreement between Fianna Fáil, Fine Gael and with the support of several independent TDs.

title: Fianna Fáil: Micheál Martin 'confident over leadership' amid review tensions
snippet: Taoiseach (Irish Prime Minister) Micheál Martin has said he is "absolutely" confident he will remain as leader of Fianna Fáil, despite criticism within the party over a review into its handling of the presidential election.

title: Micheál Martin hits back at criticism of Irish presidential election review - BBC News
snippet: Image caption, Taoiseach Micheál Martin has been under pressure since Jim Gavin dropped out of the Irish presidential race earlier this year
